su.whs.watl.text

Class BaseTextPagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • PagerAdapter
      • su.whs.watl.text.BaseTextPagerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentView.OptionsChangeListener, TextLayoutEx.PagerViewBuilder, ITextView

    public abstract class BaseTextPagerAdapter
extends PagerAdapter
implements ITextView, TextLayoutEx.PagerViewBuilder, ContentView.OptionsChangeListener
    abstract class BaseTextPagerAdapter at least one method must be implement : View getViewForPage(int pageNo)
